snippet.title: Cloud Chasers (1.0) - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
For iOS: http://bit.ly/CloudChasersiOS
For Android: http://bit.ly/CloudChasersAndroid

Cloud Chasers - A Journey of Hope - A game about migration, the hope for a better life and how to get there, Cloud Chasers is a roguelike that offers players a unique experience in each playthrough. From the makers of First Strike comes this new exciting title. To see what else we are up to, check out: http://www.cloudchasersgame.com
